alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Green Lake; Marquette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:48AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL GREEN LAKE...NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA...MARQUETTE AND NORTHERN SAUK COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM CDT... At 648 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wautoma to near Wonewoc. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Portage, Reedsburg, Berlin, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, Montello, Westfield, Princeton, Green Lake, Lawrence, Packwaukee, Mecan, Oxford, Endeavor, Neshkoro, La Valle, Ironton, Marquette, Glen Oak, and Harrisville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 88 and 105. Interstate 39 between mile markers 89 and 119. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 213 and 216. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
